content: you need to you can pick up an extra stitch in the ladder pick up 17 sts k 8 9 10 pm center of the heel this is now bor gusset round 1 knit to 3 stitches before instep k2tog k1 knit in pattern across the next 28 32 36 sts k1 ssk knit to bor round 2 knit repeat round 1 and 2 decreasing gusset stitches until 56 64 72 sts total remain knit 14 16 18 this is now the bor all sizes once you have finished your favorite heel continue knitting chart a across the top of the foot and stockinette stitch for the sole continue until 1 5 1 75 2 inches/ 4 4 5 5 cm shorter than your desired finished length toe round 1 k1 ssk knit to last 3 sts on instep needle k2tog k1 k1 ssk knit to last 3 sts on sole needle k2tog k1 round 2 knit all sts repeat round 1 and 2 until you have 10 12 14 sts on each needle 20 24 28 sts in total bind of using kitchener stitch or your favorite bind of method happy knitting feel free to share pictures #stolenbikesocks @summerbreezeknitter this pattern is for personal use only 4
